description: Despite being a bit clumsy, Kaho is on her school`s cheerleading team and loves to cheer her brother on. She is an accomplished gardener, and frequently grows flowers for and with her brother. She refers to herself in the third-person and addresses her brother as Onii-chama (お兄ちゃま?), a childish version of onii-sama. Her birthday is January 7, is a Capricorn and has a height of 143 cm (about 4` 8").
name: Kaho
